column1: The best way to predict the future is to create it.:motivational
Believe you can and you're halfway there.:motivational
It's okay to not be okay.:sad
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.:motivational
For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.:happy
Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.:sad
Within you, there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself.:calm
Anxiety is a thin stream of fear trickling through the mind. If encouraged, it cuts a channel into which all other thoughts are drained.:anxious
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.:motivational
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.:happy
Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.:sad
The day is done, and the darkness falls from the wings of night, as a feather is wafted downward from an eagle in his flight.:calm
Just because I can't explain the feelings causing my anxiety, doesn't make them less valid.:anxious
